props.name: as
props.description: The element or component this component should render as. Can be overwritten by `asChild`.

props.name: asChild
props.description:
Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.

Read our [Composition](https://akar.vinicunca.dev/core/guides/composition) guide for more details.

props.name: defaultOpen
props.description:
The open state of the collapsible when it is initially rendered.
Use when you do not need to control its open state.

props.name: disabled
props.description: When `true`, prevents the user from interacting with the collapsible.

props.name: open
props.description: The controlled open state of the collapsible. Can be binded with `v-model`.

props.name: unmountOnHide
props.description: When `true`, the element will be unmounted on closed state.

events.name: update:open
events.description: Event handler called when the open state of the collapsible changes.
